mapper.select: select t_problem_pho_id tProblemPhoId, t_problem_rep_id tProblemRepId, problemnum, pho_name phoName, pho_address phoAddress, pho_dispiay_name phoDispiayName, pho_upload_date phoUploadDate, pho_upload_people phoUploadPeople, remark, remarkone, remarktwo, remarkthree, piid from cz_task_problem_reportpho where piid = #{piid}
